scripts.build: astro build && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); function copyDir(src, dest) { if (!fs.existsSync(src)) return; fs.mkdirSync(dest, { recursive: true }); fs.readdirSync(src, { withFileTypes: true }).forEach(entry => { const srcPath = path.join(src, entry.name); const destPath = path.join(dest, entry.name); entry.isDirectory() ? copyDir(srcPath, destPath) : fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destPath); }); } copyDir('public', 'dist');"
